data.description: Kickstart your career with Nokia and dive into AI/ML and 5G innovation! As an AI/ML Architect Intern, you’ll work on real-world projects in a hands-on environment, learning the full lifecycle of AI models while contributing to next-generation wireless solutions. At Nokia, we value curiosity, creativity, and collaboration—making this the perfect place to grow your skills, learn from industry leaders, and make an impact on the future of connectivity.
